atham wruththikayo nawina shilpa krama upakarayen gewala sita ma siya rajakari itu karathi.
prasiddha pransha widyagnyayek wu lonjewan da meya sandahan karamin, ema suthraya mula anshuwaka skandhaya gananaya kirimata pawichchi nokala yuthu bawa ekalama sandahan kale ya.
gahanu lamayek, lingika hasirimata sudanam wima saha obe shailiya prakashayata alankaraya ek karanna.
ee athara thure api aapasu katha karanawa ‚Äúkalaya‚Äù gana.
jathika wyaparaye pradhanin ha pradhanin wimata katayuthu karana aya prasiddhiye ma kiyana kisima deyak agaya karanne naha.

ema sathara wana dhyana awasthawedi sukha eekaggatha thathwayada iwathwa upekkha eekaggatha thathwayata path we.
atham wita lamun dushanaya kirima, sthrin dushanaya kirima, asammatha sabandatha athi kara pawul sabandakam binda damimata upades pawa antharjalayenma nomilaye labagatha haka.
